items.headline: AMD’s stock soars 25%. Here’s why OpenAI wants a stake.
items.summary_en: AMD got a big endorsement in the form of a multiyear chip deal with OpenAI, which was also issued a warrant to purchase up to 160 million AMD shares.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Verizon names a PayPal veteran its next CEO. Can that help its lagging stock?
items.summary_en: Verizon once was widely viewed as having the best wireless network, but that’s now up in the air. New CEO Dan Schulman sees “a clear opportunity to redefine our trajectory.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I don’t wish to be petty’: My mom, 94, is leaving her $1 million estate to me, my brother and his daughter. Is that fair?
items.summary_en: “My share of the home alone would be valued at $300K per the trust. If she distributes the funds three ways, my share becomes $200K.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I’m 58, divorced and will retire at 60 with $5,300 a month. Is now a good time to buy a house?
items.summary_en: “Due to my two divorces, I had to leave the homes I bought and give up all the equity.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Fifth Third paying $10.9 billion for Comerica as wave of bank mergers builds
items.summary_en: Fifth Third said combined company will operate in some of the fastest-growing areas of the country such as Texas.

items.headline: Micron’s stock has doubled this year. Why Morgan Stanley is finally upgrading it.
items.summary_en: “Better late than never,” a Morgan Stanley analyst says as he cheers booming memory prices that could drive “substantially higher earnings power” for Micron.

items.headline: This AI skeptic got feedback from the industry — and now he’s even more pessimistic
items.summary_en: What happens when an AI skeptic gets feedback from people in the industry? He gets even more bearish that the torrent of spending can be justified.

items.headline: Firefly is beefing up its national security story, and the stock is soaring
items.summary_en: Firefly’s deal to acquire SciTech will bolster its efforts to support President Trump’s “Golden Dome” missile-defense shield.

items.headline: Never mind France — it’s time to buy European stocks again, says JPMorgan
items.summary_en: JPMorgan books profits on Japan and recommends recycling those gains into Eurozone stocks.

items.headline: More famous than Warren Buffett in decades past, Peter Lynch of Fidelity says it’s still all about investing in what you know
items.summary_en: You should be able to explain in a minute or less — even to an 11-year-old — why you own shares in a company, he says.
